price: 16. Pharaon ayant désobéi au Messager, Nous sévîmes contre lui d’une façon implacable.
arabic: فَعَصَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ أَخۡذٗا وَبِيلٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: faʿaṣā fir'ʿawnu al-rasūla fa-akhadhnāhu akhdhan wabīlan
